case.state: Definitely a better way to spend the night than studying, right, ~player~?
Shame I didn't find this place sooner, really!
Let's just hope everyone else you invited is at at least half as attractive.
The hell are you doin' waltzing in here with a real goddamn gun?
Damn people come here who don't know? Well it's real sweet of you to make sure they have a heads up, I'm Miki.
Don't think you get to keep em, but I'd be impressed if you could even stop me gettin' em back.
Hi, I'm not really sure how a butterfly plays strip poker but I sure am curious.
Well aren't you almost as cute. Names Miki. (Why do I feel like she's gonna be a pain)
Wow, guess dad was right afterall, I mean I thought so but... wow. Should I be bowing or somethin?
What's the plan here? Make me feel all bashful of my mere country status? I think given you all showed up to play strip poker royal dignity is long gone.
My kinda table, let's have some fun tonight.
Well, it's nice to have company that gets the bullshit... unless any of you are the type to brag about school being less shit for you.
Shit, I might be out of my depth for once... but your all happy to take care of me right?
See, I might be obliged to say somethin like, well this is awkward. But that'd be a lie. I'm lookin forward to this.
Well shit, a table that'd make me break a sweat in a brawl. That doesn't happen often.
Guess I swapped one boarding school for another huh.
Not gonna take shit cause you like to fling it, just to be clear.
That's a nice costume, I'm not judgin'.
Well if ya put me on this table to guilt trip me ~player~, ya win, it's workin'.
Oh boy this is gonna be fun. You've all got a lot to learn I'm guessin'.
Glad ya think I'm cute enough for the table ~player~.
I get feelin' it'll be easier then normal to get a blush out of this crowd.
My my ~player~, you just interested in this threesome?
The name's Miki. Anything else is too stuffy and formal.
Miki Mirua, here to have some fun and maybe make some friends. You can call me Miki, though.
I don't have to exchange... any cards, this feels like a trap.
No cards, this definitely feels like a good idea...
Fuck this I'm exchangin' all of them I guess.
Pretty sure this is what the kids call a shit hand. Can I get a different one please.
I'll grab ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, dealer.
Uh, fuckin'... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please.
Hmm... How about ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. What's the worst that can happen?
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, sure.
Fuck it, let's go for ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I mean, I'm probably not gonna win, but I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Sure, let's make 'em earn it ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~..
Shit ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, maybe?
The cards are all in order! That's pretty fuckin good, right?
Holy shit, i practically count as having three good hands with this.
Guess I've got two good hands for once.
No reason not to announce a good hand I can think of.
Not out just yet, teasing you all is more fun anyway.
Well, I'm probably not taking anything off this round... unless one of you can convince me.
Seems like I actually learned something from the other poker games I've played, huh.
Well, I'm happy to have the chance to watch any of you strip, honestly.
At least it's interesting to not be sure who'll lose the hand.
I mean, it's really more like Russian roulette them poker when you think about it. Though I'm okay with the reduced danger.
You all might just get lucky after all.
Well, it's been fun either way, and it's looking like it'll stay that way.
Yeah, this is the best hand I'd expect to get.
Not the handiest but hey, that's about what I've come to expect.
Bit like a fight really... no it's nothing like a fight.
I didn't come here expecting not to strip.
Well it's probably my turn now, seems fair.
I'd tell you buy me dinner before you fuck me this hard, but I respect the forwardness at least dealer.
Fuckin numbers man, never know when to stop pissin' in my cornflakes.
..I've got a pretty bad hand, huh? ..Pun intended.
If you wanted me naked this bad you could have asked me to an expensive candlelit dinner ya know... and paid for it.
Well, not gonna win with this I reckon.
I prefer my flirting a little more direct, dealer. Flattered, though.
Enjoyin the view ~player~?
Well, shit.
Well, guess I'm announcing about my bad hand again.
I wasn't trying to throw the hand... ah, well.
Well, your probably gonna see more of me now, enjoy.
Your name rings a bell for some reson... your not a TV star are you?
Fuck yeah that's lovely. Shows off your figure perfectly, gotta say, I'm pretty impressed.
Goddamn girl, that's nicer then what I brought. Your already smoking hot but that's just perfect.
I mean, punchin' my enemies in the face enough times normally works for me. Can't feel too bad about it if their already out for blood right?
Uh huh . Still it must be a bit annoying tonight's game is so easy huh?
Sure, so whenever ya bang your head on a door frame I imagine your first thought is 'shit, left ma cards behind'.
I know you're all expectin' me to say weed, probably, but I haven't actually gotten to smoke any. Cherry blossoms, maybe?
Not exactly the best for stripping, gotta say.
Yeah, I was tryin to play a little to much into a feminine side I don't have with that last strip-- can ya blame me? Sometimes a girl's gotta give it a shot at least.
Wonder if this heat is on purpose to get us strippin', that'd be a little shitty. Then again, I came here to strip anyway.
Anyone wanna go swimming later? Or would you prefer to get wet another way?
It has been too long since I've had a good swim, honestly. It's really my fault given we have a pool.
Okay this is cutesy, I like it.
This brings back lots of fond memories. Always loved running around in the snow.
Damn this is cozy, but I'll do you all a favor and not bundle up til later.
Not that exciting, honestly, but I'm sure the game will make up for that.
Well, it'll be nice to be able to clean off after... or get dirty again.
That's thoughtful of them I guess, washing off was basically my only concern.
Don't know if I can win a fistfight with any beasts that feel like they definitely live here, but I can sure as hell try.
Nothin dodgy about this location at all huh.
Well this is sketchy as fuck, I dunno what your playing at ~player~, but fuckin with me won't end well for you.
I'd be flattered and all, if you know, there wasn't so many of us.
Now that's pretty forward. gotta say I respect that.
Very serious question, but don't you think the purple in here is just a little underwhelming?
Well shit, isn't easy to make me feel under dressed but why are you all so overdressed?
So, you more of a boobs or ass person ~shy~?
So, you more of a boobs or ass person ~innocent~?
I've thought about weapons before, but I wouldn't be able to make much use of my off hand.
Damn, must be rough to need a real weapon where your from, my fist has always done just fine for me.
That's some impressive hair ~exotic hair~ nice.
Enjoyin the view over there ~shy?~.
What's the hero business like where you're from, ~hero~? I can punch people pretty good, if that's enough.
Did you all get raised believing in spirits or not? My dad has got me in the habit of honoring old shrines and stuff, but I'm not sure.
I'm m not here for trouble if you aren't ~aggressive~, but somehow I doubt that.
I don't understand how people ignore the city lights. It's wild how much tech is in just one sign.
You ever think about how thousands of years of human tech goes into a sign convincing you to buy something?
I do miss home, it's been a long time since I saw it last...
Still in it... I think.
Lots to miss about my hometown but even so... Damn this was meant to be a happy thought.
Honestly, people underrate the value of a good stretch. Ya don't have to be old to appreciate the feelin of your spine going back into place.
I was gonna bitch about the lack of walking tracks around Yamaku , and I might anyway, but It did take some effort to find the ones back home.
I never was all that good at poker. Mostly played it for the company...
I'm glad there aren't any creeps here, but I'd be willing to throw down if there was.
It's either really cute or really annoying how much some teachers actually care. I keep going back and forth.
I'm startin' to wonder if there's any actual strategy in this version of the game, but it wouldn't be the first time some smartass had a plan I didn't know.
Good cards, bad cards, but was it a good time? I can practically hear my dad saying that... and that's probably all I'm gonna mention him... movin' on.
It's absolutely crazy to me how much effort goes into cities. Like, somebody had to lay down and make every single post you see.
But Miki, what if boys don't like you because you're tough and they're insecure? Well, then good thing I don't like the majority of boys, then.
I'm really glad we still have a good view of the stars from Yamaku. Light pollution is probably my least favorite thing about the city.
Some days I regret not being more girly, then I spend enough time around most girls.
I don't mind at all that your enjoyin' my nudity, but it'll take a bit more then that to actually get me goin properly.
I wonder if the country bumpkin should be better at cards... oh well.
Honestly, it's only my competitive streak making me try to pick good cards. Losing isn't really a threat after all.
I wonder if Emi is as bouncy in bed as she is on the track. Probably not, right?
You know what I never understood, why the guys shirts are less constricting around the chest then ours. At least I can wear em.
Yeah if it wasn't obvious already I do enjoy a fight... A little more then I should maybe, Suzu certainly thinks so.
Must be nice to live in one of those stupid fantasy settings where you can fight your friends for fun and nobody gets a concussion.
Suzu's done a pretty good job about making me feel bad for gettin' into fights... but maybe I should just commit and be a boxer or somethin'.
Yamaku's festivals have always been lovely, but it's a shame seeing the students get pushed around for them. I help out, but not like some of the poor bastards.
I think you loaded with either would be much more bearable, take your pick Mikan.
Jesus, thanks for letting us all know your a raging asshole Naggy. You can shut up now though, if that's too hard, you can at least stop being a fuckwit bully, your not impressive.
Come on, ya can really keep that frown on with pretty girls stripping ~serious~?
I know that if I'd won I'd be mocking anyone taking it as a sign... but this is probably a sign.
I know that if I'd won I'd be mocking anyone taking it as a sign... but this is probably a sign... That it's one of ya bastards that'll go home all pent up.
Well, I never was a card shark... I always thought they sounded way cooler as a kid to.
Lucky you, huh, ~oop~?
Well, shy and demure never were my strong suits, enjoy.
Ya know, joinin' me now definitely increases your chances of joinin' me later .
Well, was gonna happen sooner or later.
Stripping!? At the strip poker inventory!!
Well, my first layer can't be too interesting right? Don't worry, I won't be boring for long.
Well, guess I should pretend like I'm playing hard to get, at least for one round.
There we go, things returning to normal.
Well, good to know your not much better at playing then me, even if that's a surprise.
Oh no, I've gotta strip at a strip poker game? Truly a shocking twist.
You know I don't think I actually miss my hand too much. I'm plenty capable with the one.
I think I've got the technique down Sucrose, but feel free to help me however you like.
Anyone ever tell you that desperation is a massive turn off dealer?
Well, I didn't come here not ready to strip.
I mean, really, isn't the loser the poor sucker who doesn't get to masturbate to hot naked people?
What you expect me to confess I'm nervous beneath my nerves of steal cause my tits are out? Good luck with that.
Oh no, I'm losing... should that worry me?
That's what some of the people here sound like anyway... Also yup, I sure am missin a hand, I don't mind if you stare or ask. I do mind if ya dance around it while sneakin' glances though.
Yes, in case anyone hadn't noticed I am missin my left hand. I don't mind if you look, or if you comment, just don't dance around it alright?
Yup, that sure is a missing hand I have there. Just don't be shy about it. I'd rather you stare now than sneak peeks all game when you think I can't see you.
Am I feelin' generous? Am I just getting really turned on by all of this? Why should I pick one?
Never minded the skirts, much breezier and easier to run in. Some shorts underneath and you'll disappoint everyone you'd want to.
Told ya I wasn't gonna stay boring for long. I do see the appeal of teasing, though. I reckon this view is nearly as appealing as takin' the whole shirt off... You're welcome.
Well, when I call ya boring I don't wanna be a hypocrite about it.
I'd say sorry for the boring strip, but I think you've all enjoyed more then enough of an eyeful already.
So, reckon this is a good look for me? Or would it work better if i still had a skirt?
Do you guys find more appeal in bras or underwear? I'm not sure myself.
Not gonna just leave me hanging I hope ladies?
Game feels a little more serious now, but only a little.
You better be here with permission, got my eye on you.
So tell me please, how do I look?
Okay this is pretty hot.
It's alright Mikan. I don't bite unless you ask nicely.
I'd tell you to keep it in your pants, but then I'd have no one to blame but me if you actually did.
If your wondering how I manage daily, all I can really say is that I'm not totally handicapped.
That's the end of the strip. You could stop staring now. but I don't mind the attention.
Am I setting a standard? I can only hope.
Honestly, anyone who is actually worried about their parents knowing they were here probably just has shit parents.
Sorry, it'll take more then that to get me blushing properly. Your welcome to try though.
So, how do I look?
Enjoy 'em. I know I do.
I'm not gonna lose any more clothing right now for you all. Unless one of you made a very good argument.
Take a moment to catch your breath, it's okay.
Are people really staring at the strip poker game? The audacity!
Well, ya got no shortage of confidence, guess the question is just if it's actually based on anything.
Shit, maybe I should up my game if I need you to get naked.
I'll show you mine if you show me yours, ~name~..
You have a chance to impress, gonna waste it?
I'm told the inventory is good soil for... Shit I had a good tent pun there but I lost it.
So, we gonna be impressed with what we see or what?
So you know, I've got a long and not so proud history of kicking a lot of ass.
I'm still dressed, so your not obliged to really undress... yet.
I'm glad I've got more male friends honestly. Girls tend to be trouble much sooner, mostly.
When I was a kid I always liked the idea of being a bank robber... It was a lot more fun in kids cartoons.
Do you actually wanna win this?
Well I'm sure glad I'm allowed to stick round for this.
You're certainly welcome to join me whenever you feel like it, ~name~..
Maybe keep a better eye on your cards next time, but I get it.
Shit I won that hand? All the better then.
Please be good, I can't kick your ass at the moment but I can later.
That's better Hisao. I wanna feel this on Monday.
Do you want to see how far I could stretch myself?
Yeah that's some pretty terrible luck. Interesting to know you can actually swear though.
Hey bitch! Lay off unless you want a fight with a real bully.
You gonna impress me, or are ya content with me impressing you?
Let me know when you take off something worth lookin' at alright?
Well, max limit of 8 right? So we'll all get interesting sooner or later.
Always nice to be empathized with about losin' a hand ya know?
You remind me a bit of someone I used to bea... nevermind.
Ya know, if you're are worried somebody you know would judge you for playin', maybe tell them to fuck off?
Don't worry. I understand why you're distracted.
I wonder where I could start a game of this... or with who I'd want to, actually.
I know you're looking anyway, but your welcome to.
Lovin' the attention, honey, but maybe pay a little more to your cards.
What'll it be, cutie?
Well, your pretty either way.
Tell you what, tell me what your here for, and I'll tell you in just as much detail.
I could definitely get used to this.
Don't worry. Even I'm still well-dressed, so I'm not expectin' the world.
This view will improve, you gonna keep up?
I honestly don't know if I'd rather fuck around with a guy or girl given the choice, wanna persuade me?
I probably shoulda called home by now huh? Sorry, let's see what you take off!
I mean, the game will get interesting for sooner or later... yeah, that's not helpin' much.
Normally, I'd feel at least some slight sympathy, but, honestly, ya knew what you signed up for. Hope 'ya take off somethin' good, ~name~.
Ohh, yeah, just like that, Suzu.
You gonna be part of why I came here or why I came here?
Havin fun? I know I am.
I guess it's somewhat interesting as a competition.
Somehow, this is more of a shock than all of the crazy shit I've seen here.
I didn't think we'd get to any hand tying til the game was done, hot damn.
Fuck man, this is why I'm so uneasy about idiots like you just walkin' in here with guns.
Maybe I was too harsh saying I wouldn't talk about dad again. Ya see I thought I might be killing a mood, but you've clearly taken that job.
Not sure if your loss is something to be happy over...
The idea is I'm happy enough to give you a good view...and you do the same.
I should call home more often, I just keep.. not doing that.
Let me know when you plan on being interesting alright?
Can't say I'm exactly being wooed by your manly charms.
Game does have to start somewhere, but it started a bit ago.
I can't even be mad, I'm impressed you still have that, even this late into the game.
C'mon, man, really? I'd kick your ass if I wasn't using my good hand to so much.
You can just be glad kicking your ass is against the spirit of the game.
Well, at this rate, at least you're much more likely to go home pent up compared to me.
So, you always that charmless or just when your being this distant?
Actually though, how did you manage this? Bribing the dealer is against the rules...I assume...?
So, how long 'til the game actually gets interesting?
I mean, that's life I guess but my zen does not last nearly as long as my dads. Keep that in mind.
I'm glad Yamaku is so green, it's at least a little bit like home.
Yamaku's festivals have always been lovely, but it's a shame seeing the students get pushed around for them. I help out, but not like some of the poor bastards.
You've gotta start somewhere...but it couldn't hurt to be a bit more interesting, could it?
I guess this is my fault for playing poorly, but still...
That is funny somehow... guess this is what they call stupid horny.
Well shit, normally I jump in but, something tells me not to here.
Damn, I hope she only comes back if she's comfortable, poor girl.
Right, that makes a lot more sense. Why bother with the butterfly thing?
I've thought about gettin' a good luck charm somethin like that, dunno how much I believe in spirits and stuff. It can't hurt to be on the right side of them though.
Okay, that I respect.
I like how you think. I might do something similar.
Y'know what I've never understood? People who show up to strip poker and are shaken by the idea that they might be as horny as the rest of us.
I can't decide if I respect that or it's annoying as hell... maybe both.
Any chance of you taking off something good next time?
Okay, I really am doing my best to not be rude about this... but really?
That does compliment your looks, but I'm sure we'll make up for that.
Well, I'm not bitchy enough to complain... yet.
So, what are you here for? Girls? Guys? Beautiful country bumpkins like me?
Is that special to you, or do you wear it because it makes you look even cuter?
There should really be a limit on those... then again, would you want to stop someone from showing up wearing only accessories?
Look, I get it, you've got a right to be boring.
You know, it's a little late to remove that.. unless you want an encore that badly?
It's not great the best way to win is just to load up on small shit, but on the other hand it isn't about the card game anyway.
The break from the school bullshit is very welcome. Do this, research that, it's your future on the line.. blah blah blah. It's my ears on the line at this point.
Well, at least this'll be some practice for the next time I play with my friends. Those nerds spend way too much time thinking about shit like this.
Well, hell. You're too pretty to be winning this hard.
I understand needing to not take the whole costume off at once, but surely there are better lines to draw at some point?
Gotta say, it suits you, at least.
Hey, dealer, are you really that enticed by feminine charm? I better up my game next time then.
Can't decide if I want to ask you for tips or you know, enjoy the game more.
I'm not bored since the game has to start somewhere, but it is kind of annoying...
There should definitely be a harder clothes limit, and probably an accessory limit to.
It's cute, I'll give it that.
Is that really fair? Do you feel good about doing that?
The gentle touch is a lot nicer from you Suzu, but don't slow down.
Why do I think like this? Haru wearing a cone is not my favorite idea of sexy.
I'm glad I'm still accepted by most of the school even after my past... It would have been...harder to even graduate school otherwise..
Well, being on the way to something good this early is nice.
Not the worst, still plenty of time to really get into it.
I understand if you need to warm up before you're able to hold anyones attention.
Shizune is an interesting person, I don't really like her, but I won't deny what I owe her.
You did pretty well... it's a shame isn't it?
Well, at least you haven't still got a bracelet or something like some other people I've played with.
I'd say this is stumped me but it was... Yeah that joke wasn't going anywhere good.
I've got better things to think about, at least..
Okay I'll give Haru his due, he keeps fit and he's a good guy... so maybe.
You get a pass on that one, and if your lucky, maybe more.
You'll be trying to impress us at some point, right, ~name~?
Some days I wonder if Yukio was put in my life to test if I really needed a good reason to punch people these days. Then again, some days he's not so bad.
Well, it's true you don't have to be impressive or hold our attention to play strip poker, but I thought at least you would try to impress.
Well, it'll only get better from here.
Now, I'd wish you good luck, but you don't seem like you'll need it after all...
Well, at least you're still nice to look at, y'know?
You know what has me stumped?... Nope, still can't find a good way to get that one in.
Well, at least it can only get better from here... or at least I sure hope so.
Playing coy is so overrated, tell me what you want if you want to get it.
Deep breathes, it's just a bug really.
Holy shit, yup, great character acting as an Idol, zombie.
Now for the sexiest part of the strip... Don't look at me like that! I was kidding.
I hope we can be friends after this, at least.
Feminine charm I may not have, but I can kick the ass of anyone you need me to.
I'd like a cat I think, but at both homes it would be difficult.
I did think about being a fashion designer or something at one point, but it turns out even that requires math, which is just bullshit.
I do miss just working with dad in the fields as a kid, playing around covered in mud and splashing each other.
Can't say I'm not impressed at least.
Do you... no nevermind.
School isn't so bad. You just gotta stop believin' 'em when they ramble on and on about how important it all is.
Well, games movin at least.
Your sure I couldn't encourage you to do more next time?
Guess I shouldn't be too annoyed at playin' bad, huh?
I'm no exhibitionist, but if you think just being outside in the middle of nowhere is too risky a spot for sex your probably a coward.
Well, it's not for anxiety I'm imagining you in your underwear, I'll say that.
Well, I can hardly complain about that at this point...
Ya know what city people all undervalue? Just walkin' in the woods by yourself or with a friend. It really is beautiful out there.
I miss home. There's a lot more company in the dorms, but back home, there's a sense of familiarity, y'know?
At least Yamaku is good about rules, they only hammer on you for dangerous shit like running in the halls... Not that that stops some people.
Well, onto more interesting things... right?
Enjoy winning, I guess? I'm happier knowing I won't go home all pent up.
You do plan on playing the game for real at some point, right?
I wouldn't mind going round two if you stripped a bit more, y'know?
It's okay, I'm accustomed to boring at this point.
I did not play well, huh..?
Is this really my fault? I couldn't bluff or game my way out afterall.
Would you take off any more if I asked nicely enough, and if so, how would you like me to ask?
Well, shit! Don't mind if I do...
This is more like it.. keep removin' stuff like this.
Stripping all you got to impress me with?
Well, I didn't come here for a thrilling game of cards, y'know?
Hellloo to you to.
Would've preferred this before I came, but still appreciate it.
Okay, gettin' warmer for sure, keep goin and I might let you feel just how warm.
Definitely worth it, who cares about the test.
I've decided, it's annoying.
Let's get to the next round, ~name~.
I don't know how I'm this far ahead, but ya know what, not gonna question it.
It's better to be even, y'know? Would suck to lose by a mile or somethin'.
Good look and a good attitude, both things I like.
Can't decide if I'm impressed or irritated it took you this long...
Took you long enough, ~name~.
Is it nice to just kick back with a buncha hot strangers and be horny as shit, I'll admit.
You don't gotta stop there... but I'd be really grateful if you didn't!
Come join me?
Sorry to be winning so hard, this is weird for me, too...
You got some guts, that's for sure.
Hey, you're finally repaying my kindness, ~name~.
Thank you for catching up to my second strip.
Ya know what I never understood 'Just imagine everyone in their underwear. Like thanks now I'm nervous and horny?
Very glad you decided to come along today, gotta say.
I wonder if Suzu would be interested in strip poker.. It tends to be a lot more girls, but she might swing that way..
Girls really are just better lookin' huh.
Well, I hardly expected to be at the head of the pack.
Okay, this is a little more like it.
Very nice.
Can't convince you to take off something bigger?
Not gonna complain about that cutie, but you could see about makin me beg for it instead?
That was cool, not gonna lie... are you magic to?
I'm honestly tempted to take something off for pity, but winning this hard and getting to see someone take off their ~clothing~ doesn't come by easy.
What are you taking off next then?
Ya know what I never understood 'Just imagine everyone in their underwear, like thanks now I'm nervous and horny?
Well, it's a good thing I don't mind gettin' wet, huh.
I wonder if anyone's overheard me goin' at it before in the dorms.. they're welcome for the show, I guess.
Your honestly just very pretty ya know.
Well, no complaints from me! Just hope 'ya take off somethin' bigger soon.
Lookin damn fine.
Damn, I'm glad to be playing with you, ~name~...
Thanks, damn your pretty.
You did say you where interested in girls... right?
Don't let me stop you.
I won't judge, promise.
Glad I got to see it at least.
Finally, some good shit..
Say, want a hug? After your strip that is.
I'm fairly sure I'd rather lose, but feel free to convince me.
Oh fuck, yyeah, I can tell you take care of yourself.
Can't see myself getting tired of this.
Okay, now I'm happy. Can I touch it?
How did I even manage to get this far ahead?
I am certainly happy you've caught up.
That is nice, you should be proud of it... and maybe show it off more in future games?
I can't tell 'ya why I like it so much, but I do..
Well, don't let me hold you up, boy.
Dicks really aren't all that aesthetic huh. Not that I don't want to see it.
Hey, still nice enough to make anyone who isn't judgmental happy.
That's nice, promise 'ya.
Nice, best size honestly, anyone who tells you otherwise probably watches too much porn.
That'll fit nicely, shit..,
Wondering how you'd fit? Lemme help a little.
That's not impressive because it's big, but damn, that looks nice...
I wonder if that would fit... I guess we could see, work it in slowly.
Fuckin really? If you want to leave because your uncomfortable that's one thing, but you are clearly just fucking with us.
Careful there! Shit.
I'm not here to judge on size... I may be willing to fight anyone who is though.
Wow, I'm not the worst poker player here, the more you know.
Nothing else like a good pair, and I'm not talking about poker.
